name: Ethichi - A Game Jam Game
description:
Ethichi is an alien from another planet. He has been banished from his home planet, and dumped on Earth. He finds his way to a basement of a house, where he is looking to take control of the owner. He needs a host to survive on Earth for more than a certain time. He can morph into most things (...some things) in order to help himself through this house to get to the owner (or in this case... a large teddy bear).

Your goal is to help Ethichi through levels by finding a key and unlocking doors.

This was game made in 3 days for a casual game jam.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD or Left Analog Stick
  • Camera Controls - Mouse or Right Analog Stick
  • Jump - Spacebar or X (Playstation) or A (Xbox)
  • Morph - F on Keyboard or Square (Playstation) or X (Xbox)

Note: The HAMMER can break objects in the basement
